channel.title: My Chemical Romance on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in My Chemical Romance on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: My Chemical Romance Makes a Triumphant and Theatrical Return to ‘The Black Parade’ in L.A.
item.description: Nearly 19 years after the release of the seminal emo album, the New Jersey rock band brought fans back in time by playing the album in its entirety along with a set of largely B-side tracks.
